name: Clones
description: Clones is a friendly, fun, and engaging evolution to the classic puzzle genre which includes robust internet-multiplayer and a built-in level editor.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 10 / 8 / 7 / Vista / XP Processor: 1.5+ GHz Intel or AMD Memory: 512MB RAM Graphics: 64MB DirectX® 9.0c DirectX®: DirectX® 9.0c Hard Drive: 500MB Sound: DirectX® 9.0c compliant sound card Multiplayer: Internet or LAN Connection

reviews.review_text: a lemmings game re-mastered for this day of age. It seems like it will have lots of replay-ability with countless levels and online play
Lovely graphics and nice puzzles, whoever likes Lemmings will like Clones, it´s like Lemmings with a twist :)
This is the first Lemmings successor to capture the fun of the original, and it improves on it in every way. If you liked Lemmings, I highly recommend this.
